      • getLocation

        public Location getLocation(java.lang.String location)
        This method is called to check if the location is valid. It searches through the Location enum to see if the location is valid.
        Parameters:
        location - a string with the location the user has entered
        Returns:
        a location object if the parameter is equal to a Location enum. If it is not equal to a Location enum, it returns null.

      • getTime

        Returns:

        Returns:
        date string of new date.

      • classExists

        public boolean classExists(FitnessClass class1)
        This method is called to check if the member is in the cardio class. It calls the find method from the FitnessClass class to see if the member is in the class.
        Parameters:
        class1 - a Member object with the member the user has entered
        Returns:
        true if the member is not in the class. If the member is in the class, it returns false.
